snippet: As the last line of defense for the Los Angeles Kings, goalie Jonathan Quick is used to being in the firing line, both on and off the ice....

headline.print_headline: Kings' Quick Saving His Best for When It Matters Most
headline.main: Kings' Quick Saving His Best for When It Matters Most

lead_paragraph: As the last line of defense for the Los Angeles Kings, goalie Jonathan Quick is used to being in the firing line, both on and off the ice.
